comments.title: Could be way better
comments.description: Pros: Design             Finish and Fitting             Silent wash , No noise            Easy Operation, Simple Steps            Many Wash Programs            Build quality is Heavy            Rat Mesh (given but low quality)            Consume Less Water             Cons: Small Pipe (inlet pipe)              Installation was horrible (No Knowledge of this product, No proper Demo, No Demo with Mobile App as the technician was unaware of that mobile operation )

comments.title: Perfect product!
comments.description: World class product, excellent build quality, washing is top notch, WiFi & Samsung smart things is cool. I have used samsung top load earlier for almost 13 years without any issues so trusted Samsung and had it exchanged. Its worth it and the exchange process was perfect. Delivered in a day by Flipkart and they took old one immediately after delivery. Very next day installation done by Jeevs. Everything was just perfect.  Go ahead with this if you need top model.
